ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It was actually 2 bards that did that. With lutes. The resists when one bard tried it were too much. Also, remember that this was at the top of
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Oct 11/00, John Tatsukawa <john@...> wrote:
>
> I do remember reading stories of bards in Blackburrow mezzing 30+ mobs at a
> time, which probably prompted the nerf. However, now I believe you can only
> affect at most 4 mobs, so that kind of solves that worry.

It was actually 2 bards that did that. With lutes. The resists when one
bard tried it were too much. Also, remember that this was at the top of
blackburrow, and 90% of the crowd of gnolls mezzed at the time were
green to the 2 bards, and they still woke up occasionally and took a
poke at the bards.

Wish I could find my old screenshot of it, it was 2 friends of mine I
played with on Fennin Ro back in Beta 4, and it made screenshot of the
day just after beta closed.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
